name: The Three Scoop Parlor
description:
You manage an ice cream parlor that only sells Three Scoops At A Time™. Customers will ask for "dangerous" or "sexy" ice cream and you have to make up a mix on the spot! Each new creation is accompanied by its own individual mix of sound and name snippets. Enjoy!

This game was created as part of the FemDevsJam 2021 for the theme "Connection" - check out the other entries as well!

Team:

Anas: Code & Design (Twitter, Instagram, Website)
Hannah: 3D Modelling & Texturing (Art Station)
Lena: 3D Modelling & Texturing (Art Station, Instagram)
Milan: Sound & Writing (Twitter)
Red: Background Art, Writing & Management (Instagram)

Additional Credits:

  • Sounds by these wonderful people from Freesound.org: InspectorJ, schottenrock, rattle, rossb, CuddleNucks, pyro13djt, xinaesthete, videog, Huggy13ear
  • Title Generator used for our title splash page: https://promaretitlegenerator.com/
  • Background based on a photo by @sharonmccutcheon on Unsplash
